name: Mene Mene Tekel Upharsin
description:
Small game made over a few days for Cosmo D's Game Jam #1.

An attempt to capture a particular atmosphere and mood in my hometown of Belfast. It's just you, the back alley, a gable end and some spray paint. Do what thou wilt.

WASD to move, left mouse to spray. Press 1 and 2 to toggle between black and red paint.

This game contains various images sourced from the street, including some tags from local writers. No theft or infringement is intended.

Made with Unity 2018, with UFPS and Playmaker plug-ins.
Deodorant can model by Deployer (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/tools/deodorant-body-spray-67412) Flag asset by Telecaster (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/cloth-animation-based-fl...) Everything else by Andrew Pope (dats me)
